about_the_game:
Sexbot Lab is a fully animated game featuring crossword-like mechanics, but unlike typical crossword games, Nova rewards you after every correct word. Sometimes, your reward is a customization option. Other times, it’s a steamy conversation, a sex scene, or a surprise of another kind~

You can expect:

  • Over 450 words with various interactions for you to explore.

  • Over 150 customization options.

  • Over 100 unique sex scene combinations with Nova!

  • A variety of new rewards with Nova, like cum shots, impregnation, and more, to mix with customizations for endless fun!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features adult themes and content intended for mature audiences only. All characters portrayed are 20 years or older. The game features fully animated sexual content.

name: Sexbot Lab Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Not an integrated video card; DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 720 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to Sexbot Lab! Design your perfect companion with endless customizations to bring every fantasy you can imagine to life. Nova, your personal Sexbot, is crafted to fulfill your wildest desires in a futuristic world where satisfaction knows no limits.
